channel.title: Navbar support for length dashboard
channel.description: This is regarding a feature request. Currently there is no support for a navbar in dashboards. A long dashboard becomes very difficult to move around. Is a support for a dashboard navigation bar possible in future releases?

item.title: Navbar support for length dashboard
item.dc:creator: aayush749
item.description:
This is regarding a feature request. Currently there is no support for a navbar in dashboards. A long dashboard becomes very difficult to move around. Is a support for a dashboard navigation bar possible in future releases?
